Literature.Title: Short, symmetric-helical peptides have narrow-spectrum activity with low resistance potential and high selectivity.
Literature.Author: Chou S, Wang J, Shang L, Akhtar MU, Wang Z, Shi B, Feng X, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7 CICC 21530(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=128µM),Streptococcus agalactiae BNCC 185941(MIC=128µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 8014(MIC=128µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0936(MIC=128µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.9021(MIC=128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=128µM)
